The British School of Guangzhou
Dear Parents,
We are welcoming new applicants to join the one to one instrumental program for this term at BSG.
If you are interested in having your child learn the Guitar, Flute, Piano, Violin or Drums with one of our visiting music teachers, please CLICK HERE for the Application Letter and CLICK HERE for the Terms and Conditions.
Please print, sign and return both these documents to the music department by Monday the 13th of January to enroll.
You will find information about our teachers, lesson structure, payment procedure and the benefits of learning a musical instrument in the attached documents.
Late applications will be accepted depending on availability.
In the interim thank you for your time.
Kind Regards,
Fred Zhang
Musician in Residence & Music Administrator
The British School of Guangzhou
